alert.note: Alert for Flat Tops; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; Grand and Battlement Mesas; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GrandJunction (Western Colorado and Eastern Utah)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 29 at 3:12AM MDT until March 31 at 12:00PM MDT by NWS GrandJunction
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM THURSDAY TO NOON MDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches with locally higher amounts possible. Winds gusting as high as 50 mph. * WHERE...Grand and Battlement Mesas, Gore and Elk Mountains/Central Mountain Valleys, West Elk and Sawatch Mountains and Flat Tops. * WHEN...From 6 AM Thursday to noon MDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility, especially on ridge tops. A detailed map of the snowfall can be found at: www.weather.gov/gjt/winter.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Flat Tops; Gore and Elk Mountains, Central Mountain Valleys; Grand and Battlement Mesas; West Elk and Sawatch Mountains
